name: RetrieveBlogPosts
description:
Retrieve all blog posts with optional paging and filtering.

Use this tool to access and browse all blog posts available, with additional options for paging and filtering. Ideal for integrating services that need to ingest blog content and suggest edits.

parameters.name: filter_by_creation_time
parameters.description: Return only blog posts created at the specified time in ISO 8601 format.

value_schema.description: Only return blog posts created at exactly the specified time.

parameters.name: created_after
parameters.description: Return blog posts created after the specified time. Use ISO 8601 format for the date-time.

value_schema.description: Only return blog posts created after the specified time.

parameters.name: created_before
parameters.description: Only return blog posts created before the specified time in ISO 8601 format.

value_schema.description: Only return blog posts created before the specified time.

parameters.name: updated_at_exact
parameters.description: Return blog posts last updated at the exact specified time in ISO 8601 format.

value_schema.description: Only return blog posts last updated at exactly the specified time.

parameters.name: filter_by_update_after
parameters.description: Only return blog posts last updated after the specified timestamp. Use a format such as ISO 8601 for date and time.

value_schema.description: Only return blog posts last updated after the specified time.

parameters.name: updated_before_date
parameters.description: Return blog posts last updated before this date. Use ISO 8601 format (e.g., '2023-09-04T15:00:00Z').

value_schema.description: Only return blog posts last updated before the specified time.

parameters.name: sort_fields_for_results
parameters.description: An array specifying fields to sort blog posts. Use fields like `createdAt`, `name`, `updatedAt`, `createdBy`, `updatedBy`.

value_schema.description: Specifies which fields to use for sorting results. Valid fields are `createdAt` (default), `name`, `updatedAt`, `createdBy`, `updatedBy`.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor_token
parameters.description: The cursor token to retrieve the next set of blog post results. Obtain from `paging.next.after` in a previous response.

value_schema.description: The cursor token value to get the next set of results. You can get this from the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: The maximum number of blog post results to return. Default is 20.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 20.

parameters.name: return_specific_properties
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of specific fields to return for each blog post (e.g., 'title,author,date'). Leave empty to return all fields.

parameters.name: include_archived_posts
parameters.description: Specify true to include archived (deleted) blog posts in the results. Defaults to false.

value_schema.description: Specifies whether to return deleted blog posts. Defaults to `false`.
